newsitem.title: MEXICO: RESEARCH ALERT - Apasco upgraded to buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Apasco upgraded to buy.

text.p: Flemings Research on Friday upgraded Mexican cement company Apasco SA de CV to buy from hold.
--Analyst Ben Uglow said uncertainty in the near future over Mexico cement prices and recent weak quarterly earning report had created "buying opportunity in Apasco shares."

--Q1 results showed "major deterioration" in profitability due to price declines and electricity cost increases, but those seen as "one-time events not expected to recur during the remainder of the year."
--Price competition in Mexico "will likely be short-lived," Uglow said.
--Mexican cement industry showing volume recovery of five percent or more this year.
--Apasco "remains a well-managed, highly cash-generative cement business."
